Commentary.ab: Y10.13c pouru.narəm] Kellens, Pirart (Bartholomae); Geldner pourunarəm.

Y10.13c †kərənūši] Geldner, Kellens, Pirart; Kellens, 2007 p. 79 "la restitution *kərənūiδi est la plus plausible (Kellens, 1984 p. 174); same suggestion by De Vaan, 2003 p. 306, Pirart, 2004 p. 275, n. 36). Hoffmann and Forssman, 1996 p. 215 suggest 2nd. sg. pres. ind. med. *kərənūše (Ved. kr̥ṇuṣe), but not supported by mss. Middle voice here unexpected.
